item.title: Kaya add a quote by Keith Miller
item.description: "Stories are life," protested Pico. "Without them, books would be only paper and ink, with them they breathe, the reader is drawn in, the stories become him." -- Keith Miller

item.title: Kaya add a quote by Keith Miller
item.description: "And he loves to read. He loves the whisper of the pages and the way his fingertips catch on rough paper, the pour of the words up from the leaves, through soft light, into his eyes, the mute voice in his ears." -- Keith Miller

item.title: Kaya add a quote by Keith Miller
item.description: "Memories must enter the bloodstream, must churn awhile through the heart's mill, must be crushed and polished, be nearly forgotten or cling like burs to other stories before they spill forth in purple patterns, shapes of small bones and worm rot, shapes of clouds and the spaces between leaves." -- Keith Miller
